charinfo.name: Tsunade
charinfo.description: One of the three sannins, Tsunade is a gambling, sake drinking loving woman with a tough exterior but soft interior. Tsunade is an expert at medical jutsu, using it to remove all her wounds, or delivering high impact kicks.

abilities.name: Heavenly Foot Of Pain
abilities.description: With her insane strength, Tsunade performs an axe kick on one enemy dealing 30 damage while stunning their physical and mental skills for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Creation Rebirth
abilities.description: Tsunade unleashes her stored chakra, setting her health to 100 and removing all harmful effects on her.

abilities.name: Major Summoning: Katsuyu
abilities.description: Summoning Katsuyu, Tsunade instantly heals herself and her allies for 40 health. For the rest of the game, Tsunade's team will heal 5 health each turn, and this skill will be replaced by 'Slug Division'. This skill will end when Tsunade dies.

abilities.name: Slug Division
abilities.description: Katsuyu splits into many smaller versions of herself, healing her team for 10 health and granting them 10 destructible defense.

abilities.name: Elbow Block
abilities.description: This skill makes Tsunade invulnerable for 1 turn.
